data.eml:eml: New taxa and taxonomic revisions to the Poraniidae (Valvatacea, Asteroidea) with Comments on Feeding Biology

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mah, Christopher L., Foltz, David W. (2014): New taxa and taxonomic revisions to the Poraniidae (Valvatacea, Asteroidea) with Comments on Feeding Biology. Zootaxa 3795 (3): 327-372, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3795.3.7
